text: Carlos Alberto Oneto Villavicencio (5 May 1929 - 1 April 2014) was a Peruvian actor, television personality, and comedian. He was known as "Pantuflas" (Slippers). He created the comedy group "EL Tornillo" (The Screw). Oneto died on 1 April 2014 in his hometown of Lima, Peru, aged 84.Murió actor cómico Carlos Oneto ´Pantuflas´ ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1929 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Actors from Lima Category:Peruvian television actors
title: Carlos Oneto
